metadata.title: RA Family: Could AI Kit support multimodal application? Or single(uni)-modal only?

sections.content:
Question:
Could AI Kit support multimodal application? Or single(uni)-modal only?
Answer:
This AI Kit is capable to perform both single and multimodal application support.
Suitable Products
AIK-RA6M3
AIK-RA4E1
